charges.charge_description: 26:5861(d) and 5845(a)(8) - Possession of a Destructive Device
Collection of Extension of Credit by Extortionate Means 18:894(a)(1) &; 891(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months on Counts 1s-4s and 8s, to run concurrently, and 60 months on Count 10s, to run consecutively, for a total term of incarceration of 180 months; 5 years of supervised release with standard and special conditions as set forth in the Judgment; $100.00 special assessment per count; fine waived; restitution in the amount of $196,982.34
